[ Teardown ] Run Keyword If Test Failed Log Hello from teardown!
Fail ${EXPECTED FAILURE}

Noop

[ Setup ] Run Keyword If Test Failed Fail ${MESSAGE}#Should not be executed nor evaluated
Noop
Run Keyword If Test Failed Can't Be Used in Test [ Document ] FAIL Keyword 'Run Keyword If Test Failed' can only be used in test teardown

[ Teardown ] Run Keyword If Test Failed Teardown UK ${TEARDOWN MESSAGE}
Fail ${EXPECTED FAILURE}
Run Keyword If Test Failed Fails [ Document ] FAIL Expected failure\n\nAlso teardown failed:\nExpected teardown failure
[ Teardown ] Run Keyword If Test Failed Fail Expected teardown failure
Fail ${EXPECTED FAILURE}
